meanings.definition: Not lying in the same straight line.
meanings.sent1: The three points were noncollinear, forming a triangle.
meanings.sent2: The noncollinear stars in the sky created a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent3: The noncollinear arrangement of toys on the shelf made it look like a playful display.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were noncollinear, jumping from one idea to another without a clear path.
meanings.sent5: The noncollinear pattern of the flowers in the garden was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The noncollinear lines on the graph showed no relationship between the variables.
meanings.sent2: The noncollinear roads in the city confused the tourists.
meanings.sent3: The noncollinear arrangement of furniture in the room gave it a unique and quirky vibe.
meanings.sent4: Their opinions were noncollinear, leading to a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The noncollinear shapes in the painting added depth and complexity to the artwork.
